A dining area is likely to be small in a cruise ship. A cruise ship has limited space, so the dining area is likely to be small. A home has more space, so the dining area is likely to be larger. A mall has many stores, so the dining area is likely to be larger. A restaurant has many tables, so the dining area is likely to be larger. A dark cave has no dining area, so it is not likely to be small.

Therefore, the final answer is: A.
